game.name: Outworld Defence
game.shortDescription: Outworld Defense is a 2D tower defense game where you recruit defenders, fortify your mansion, purchase upgrades, and use bonuses to protect it from hordes of demonic creatures.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Outworld Defense is a 2D tower defense game where you recruit defenders, fortify your mansion, purchase upgrades, and use bonuses to protect it from hordes of demonic creatures.
